name: Stewart's Trials ( MiniJam-113 )
description:
You're in control of Stewart, a little rat knight who is destinated to fight a tree monster who has been dooming his clan for ages.  Stewart must do something about it by his own, however when he takes a short nap, he's unable to tell if he's been dreaming or not, you must found out.

Controls:

Arrows Keys - Move;

Z - Jump;

X - Attack;

C - Dodge;

A - When holding it'll charge your boomerang, when released it'll throw it.

R - ( In case of any bugs and you're unable to die, this key will insta-kill you )

Credits:

  • Khaos as Director and Artist
  • Aküra as Director, Coder, Spriter
  • Kizunmi as Composer
  • Camile as Artist and Spriter
  • Socks as Composer
